item.title: I-70 East - Exit 260
item.description: I-70 east at Exit 260 - CO-470/Boulder/Colorado Springs.

item.title: I-70 East - Exit 260
item.description: I-70 east approaching Exit 260 - CO-470/Boulder/Colorado Springs. CO-470 is part of the beltway around the Denver area.

item.title: CO-470 West at I-70 West
item.description: CO-470 West at I-70 West to Grand Junction. Continue north on CO-470 to US-6/6th Ave./Boulder. CO-470 ends just north of here at US-6 junction.

item.title: CO-470 West - Exit 1
item.description: CO-470 west approaching Exit 1 - I-70/Grand Junction/Denver. CO-470 continues north of the I-70 junction, ending at US-6 (6th Ave.).

item.title: CO-470 West - Exits 6 and 5B-A
item.description: CO-470 west approaching Exit 6 - Quincy Ave. Approaching Exit 5B-A - US-285/Denver/Fairplay.

item.title: I-25 South/CO-470/E-470 Separation
item.description: I-25 South ramp to CO-470/E-470. Merge left for E-470 (Toll Road); merge right for CO-470 west

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 194
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 194 - E-470 North - Toll/Limon and CO-470 West/Grand Junction. E-470/CO-470 is a beltway around the Denver area. This is the southern point on the beltway.

item.title: I-25 South - Exits 195 and 194
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 195 - County Line Road. Approaching Exit 194 - E-470 Toll/CO-470 West/Limon/Grand Junction.
